title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews

items.title: San Diego officials approve $30M settlement for family of teen killed by police
items.description: The San Diego City Council has approved a $30 million payment to the family of a 16-year-old killed by police

items.title: DOJ ends monitoring of illegal dumping in Houston in retreat from environmental justice
items.description: The U.S. Justice Department has withdrawn from an agreement with Houston to curb illegal dumping in Black and Latino neighborhoods
